product.longDescription: Dark purple carrots, inside and out, with improved bolting tolerance. 8–10" long, smooth roots hold their shape in the field and are great for bunching or mechanical harvest. Similar to Purple Haze in size, but slower to develop. Tops are also stronger and more upright. Roots are smaller and slower to size-up than Purple Elite's and have lesser-quality tops. Pelleted seed. Avg. 18,500 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Uniform roots with refined tops. Conventional seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

attributes.label: Product Feature Additional
value: Recommended Summer Planting for Fall Harvest

Purple Sun Pelleted (F1) Carrot Seed

Product ID:4574JP.114574JP
Zoom Image

Purple Sun Pelleted (F1) Carrot Seed

Product ID:4574JP.114574JP

Dark purple carrots, inside and out, with improved bolting tolerance. 8–10" long, smooth roots hold their shape in the field and are great for bunching or mechanical harvest. Similar to Purple Haze in size, but slower to develop. Tops are also stronger and more upright. Roots are smaller and slower to size-up than Purple Elite's and have lesser-quality tops. Pelleted seed. Avg. 18,500 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
